name: Hot Pursuit
summary_text: An uptight and by-the-book cop tries to protect the outgoing widow of a drug boss as they race through Texas pursued by crooked cops and murderous gunmen.

name: The Passion of Joan of Arc
summary_text: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

name: Steel Magnolias
summary_text: A young beautician, newly arrived in a small Louisiana town, finds work at the local salon, where a small group of women share a close bond of friendship, and welcome her into the fold.

name: The War of the Roses
summary_text: A married couple try everything to get each other to leave the house in a vicious divorce battle.

name: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
summary_text: Scientist Sherman Klump's inventions, his upcoming marriage to his pretty colleague Denise Gaines and his reputation are threatened by his evil clone Buddy Love.

name: The East
summary_text: An operative for an elite private intelligence firm finds her priorities changing dramatically after she is tasked with infiltrating an anarchist group known for executing covert attacks upon major corporations.

name: The Big Blue
summary_text: The rivalry between Enzo and Jacques, two childhood friends and now world-renowned free divers, becomes a beautiful and perilous journey into oneself and the unknown.

name: A Man Called Ove
summary_text: Ove, an ill-tempered, isolated retiree who spends his days enforcing block association rules and visiting his wife's grave, has finally given up on life just as an unlikely friendship develops with his boisterous new neighbors.

name: Colonia
summary_text: A young woman's desperate search for her abducted boyfriend draws her into the infamous Colonia Dignidad, a sect nobody has ever escaped from.

name: 15 Minutes
summary_text: A homicide detective and a fire marshal must stop a pair of murderers who commit videotaped crimes to become media darlings.

name: Buffalo '66
summary_text: After being released from prison, Billy is set to visit his parents with his wife, whom he does not actually have. This provokes Billy to act out, as he kidnaps a girl and forces her to act as his wife for the visit.

name: Don Juan DeMarco
summary_text: A psychiatrist must cure a young patient that presents himself as Don Juan, the greatest lover in the world.

name: THX 1138
summary_text: In the 25th century, a time when people have designations instead of names, a man, THX 1138, and a woman, LUH 3417, rebel against their rigidly-controlled society.

name: Odd Thomas
summary_text: In a California desert town, a short-order cook with clairvoyant abilities encounters a mysterious man with a link to dark, threatening forces.

name: The Benchwarmers
summary_text: A trio of guys try and make up for missed opportunities in childhood by forming a three-player baseball team to compete against standard children's Little League squads.

name: Flashdance
summary_text: A Pittsburgh woman with two jobs as a welder and an exotic dancer wants to get into ballet school.

name: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
summary_text: During their college years, Anjali was in love with her best-friend Rahul, but he had eyes only for Tina. Years later, Rahul and the now-deceased Tina's eight-year-old daughter attempts to reunite her father and Anjali.

name: Chain Reaction
summary_text: Two researchers in a green alternative energy project are put on the run when they are framed for murder and treason.

name: The Back-up Plan
summary_text: A woman conceives twins through artificial insemination, then meets the man of her dreams on the very same day.

name: Everything Must Go
summary_text: When an alcoholic relapses, causing him to lose his wife and his job, he holds a yard sale on his front lawn in an attempt to start over. A new neighbor might be the key to his return to form.

name: Down by Law
summary_text: Two men are framed and sent to jail, where they meet a murderer who helps them escape and leave the state.

name: National Security
summary_text: Two mismatched security guards are thrown together to bust a smuggling operation.

name: Duplicity
summary_text: Two ex-government agents turned rival industrial spies have to be at the top of their game when one of their companies prepares to launch a major product. However, they distract each other in more ways than one.

name: Bull Durham
summary_text: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

name: Fletch
summary_text: Irwin M. "Fletch" Fletcher is a newspaper reporter being offered a large sum to off a cancerous millionaire, but is on the run, risking his job and finding clues when it's clear the man is healthy.

name: Holidate
summary_text: Fed up with being single on holidays, two strangers agree to be each other's platonic plus-ones all year long, only to catch real feelings along the way.

name: In the Tall Grass
summary_text: After hearing a young boy's cry for help, a sister and brother venture into a vast field of tall grass in Kansas but soon discover there may be no way out...and that something evil lurks within.

name: Friday the 13th Part III
summary_text: Having revived from his wounds, Jason Voorhees takes refuge at a cabin near Crystal Lake. As a group of co-eds arrive for their vacation, Jason continues his killing spree.

name: Under the Tuscan Sun
summary_text: A writer impulsively buys a villa in Tuscany in order to change her life.

name: Jab We Met
summary_text: A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.

name: Andrei Rublev
summary_text: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

name: The Lady Vanishes
summary_text: While travelling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.

name: Always Be My Maybe
summary_text: Everyone assumed Sasha and Marcus would wind up together except for Sasha and Marcus. Reconnecting after 15 years, the two start to wonder - maybe?

name: Sanju
summary_text: Sanju is a biopic of the controversial life of actor Sanjay Dutt: his film career, jail sentence and personal life.

name: The Sentinel
summary_text: A Secret Service agent is framed as the mole in an assassination attempt on the President. He must clear his name and foil another assassination attempt while on the run from a Secret Service Protective Intelligence Division agent.

name: The Last Exorcism
summary_text: A troubled evangelical minister agrees to let his last exorcism be filmed by a documentary crew.

name: Children of the Corn
summary_text: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believes that everyone over age 18 must be killed.

name: This Boy's Life
summary_text: The story about the relationship between a rebellious 1950s teenager and his abusive stepfather, based on the memoirs of writer and literature Professor Tobias Wolff.

name: Hotel Artemis
summary_text: Set in riot-torn, near-future Los Angeles, 'Hotel Artemis' follows the Nurse, who runs a secret, members-only emergency room for criminals.

name: Can You Ever Forgive Me?
summary_text: When Lee Israel falls out of step with current tastes, she turns her art form to deception.

name: American Splendor
summary_text: An original mix of fiction and reality illuminates the life of comic book hero everyman Harvey Pekar.

name: Rough Night
summary_text: Things go terribly wrong for a group of girlfriends who hire a male stripper for a bachelorette party in Miami.

name: Extinction
summary_text: A father has a recurring dream of losing his family. His nightmare turns into reality when the planet is invaded by a force bent on destruction. Fighting for their lives, he comes to realize an unknown strength to keep them safe from harm.

name: Untraceable
summary_text: FBI agent Jennifer Marsh is tasked with hunting down a seemingly untraceable serial killer who posts live videos of his victims on the Internet. As time runs out, the cat and mouse chase becomes more personal.

name: The Double
summary_text: A clerk in a government agency finds his unenviable life takes a turn for the horrific with the arrival of a new co-worker who is both his exact physical double and his opposite - confident, charismatic and seductive with women.

name: Ordinary People
summary_text: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father, and the guilt-ridden younger son.

name: Bulletproof Monk
summary_text: Based on the very underground comic book of the same name, a Tibetan monk becomes a mentor to a young street punk and tries teaching him how to protect the scroll of ultimate power from a secret Nazi organization bent on world domination.

name: Formula 51
summary_text: An American master chemist plans to score big on a once in a lifetime drug deal. All does not go as planned and he is soon entangled in a web of deceit.

name: Bullet to the Head
summary_text: After watching their respective partners die, a New Orleans hitman and a Washington, D.C. detective form an alliance in order to bring down their common enemy.

name: Lions for Lambs
summary_text: Injuries sustained by two Army rangers behind enemy lines in Afghanistan set off a sequence of events involving a congressman, a journalist and a professor.

name: Naked Lunch
summary_text: After developing an addiction to the substance he uses to kill bugs, an exterminator accidentally kills his wife, and becomes involved in a secret government plot being orchestrated by giant bugs in a port town in North Africa.

name: Winter Sleep
summary_text: A hotel owner and landlord in a remote Turkish village deals with conflicts within his family and a tenant behind on his rent.

name: The Adventures of Robin Hood
summary_text: When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a rebel guerrilla army.

name: The Big Wedding
summary_text: A long-divorced couple fakes being married as their family unites for a wedding.

name: Kinsey
summary_text: A look at the life of Alfred Kinsey, a pioneer in the area of human sexuality research, whose 1948 publication "Sexual Behavior in the Human Male" was one of the first recorded works that saw science address sexual behavior.

name: The Beaver
summary_text: A troubled husband and executive adopts a beaver hand-puppet as his sole means of communication.

name: Five Feet Apart
summary_text: A pair of teenagers with cystic fibrosis meet in a hospital and fall in love, though their disease means they must avoid close physical contact.

name: While We're Young
summary_text: A middle-aged couple's career and marriage are overturned when a disarming young couple enters their lives.

name: The Purple Rose of Cairo
summary_text: In New Jersey in 1935, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.

name: The Blind Swordsman: Zatoichi
summary_text: The blind masseur/swordsman comes to a town in control of warring gangs, and while bunking with a farming family, he meets two women with their own agenda.

name: Rabbit Hole
summary_text: Life for a happy couple is turned upside down after their young son dies in an accident.

name: Rachel Getting Married
summary_text: A young woman who has been in and out of rehab for the past ten years, returns home for the weekend for her sister's wedding.

name: How Do You Know
summary_text: After being cut from the U.S.A. softball team and feeling a bit past her prime, Lisa finds herself evaluating her life and in the middle of a love triangle, as a corporate guy in crisis competes with her current, baseball-playing beau.

name: Throne of Blood
summary_text: A war-hardened general, egged on by his ambitious wife, works to fulfill a prophecy that he would become lord of Spider's Web Castle.

name: The Grudge 2
summary_text: Three interwoven stories about a terrible curse. A young woman encounters a malevolent supernatural force while searching for her missing sister in Tokyo; a mean high school prank goes horribly wrong; a woman with a deadly secret moves into a Chicago apartment building.

name: Tusk
summary_text: A brash and arrogant podcaster gets more than he bargained for when he travels to Canada to interview a mysterious recluse... who has a rather disturbing fondness for walruses.

name: Dracula
summary_text: After a naive real estate agent succumbs to the will of Count Dracula, the two head to London where the vampire sleeps in his coffin by day and searches for potential victims by night.

name: The Upside
summary_text: A comedic look at the relationship between a wealthy man with quadriplegia and an unemployed man with a criminal record who's hired to help him.

name: White Noise
summary_text: An architect's desire to speak with his wife from beyond the grave becomes an obsession with supernatural repercussions.

name: French Kiss
summary_text: A woman flies to France to confront her straying fiancee, but gets into trouble when the charming crook seated next to her uses her for smuggling.

name: Bad Words
summary_text: A spelling bee loser sets out to exact revenge by finding a loophole and attempting to win as an adult.

name: Death at a Funeral
summary_text: A funeral ceremony turns into a debacle of exposed family secrets and misplaced bodies.

name: Sunrise
summary_text: An allegorical tale about a man fighting the good and evil within him. Both sides are made flesh - one a sophisticated woman he is attracted to and the other his wife.

name: Before I Fall
summary_text: February 12 is just another day in Sam's charmed life, until it turns out to be her last. Stuck reliving her last day over and over, Sam untangles the mystery around her death and discovers everything she's losing.

name: The Wind that Shakes the Barley
summary_text: Against the backdrop of the Irish War of Independence, two brothers fight a guerrilla war against British forces.

name: Orange County
summary_text: A guidance counselor mistakenly sends out the wrong transcripts to Stanford University under the name of an over-achieving high schooler.

name: The Covenant
summary_text: Four young men who belong to a New England supernatural legacy are forced to battle a fifth power long thought to have died out. Meanwhile, jealousy and suspicion threaten to tear them apart.

name: Last Night
summary_text: The story follows a married couple, apart for a night while the husband takes a business trip with a colleague to whom he's attracted. While he's resisting temptation, his wife encounters her past love.

name: Laxmii
summary_text: The film deals with a ghost seeking vengeance for being wronged and haunts everyone who is staying in the house.

name: A Goofy Movie
summary_text: When Max makes a preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

name: Hard Boiled
summary_text: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.

name: Fair Game
summary_text: CIA operative Valerie Plame discovers her identity is allegedly leaked by the government as payback for an op-ed article her husband wrote criticizing the Bush administration.

name: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark
summary_text: A young girl sent to live with her father and his new girlfriend believes that she has released creatures from a sealed ash pit in the basement of her new home.

name: Darbareye Elly
summary_text: The mysterious disappearance of a kindergarten teacher during a picnic in the north of Iran is followed by a series of misadventures for her fellow travelers.

name: Disclosure
summary_text: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

name: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
summary_text: Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

name: Sharknado
summary_text: When a freak hurricane swamps Los Angeles, nature's deadliest killer rules sea, land, and air as thousands of sharks terrorize the waterlogged populace.

name: Teen Wolf
summary_text: An ordinary high school student discovers that his family has an unusual pedigree when he finds himself turning into a werewolf.

name: The House with a Clock in Its Walls
summary_text: A young orphan named Lewis Barnavelt aids his magical uncle in locating a clock with the power to bring about the end of the world.

name: Vampires Suck
summary_text: A spoof of vampire-themed movies. Teenager, Becca finds herself torn between 2 boys. As she and her friends wrestle with a number of different dramas, everything comes to a head at their prom.

name: Baby's Day Out
summary_text: After three kidnappers lose the baby they have kidnapped, both the cops and kidnappers go looking for the baby.

name: Footloose
summary_text: City teenager Ren MacCormack moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

name: Gomorrah
summary_text: Scampia Vele is the corbusian architecture which has become a stronghold for Mafia of Naples, Italy.

name: Airheads
summary_text: Three band members hoping for a big break head to a radio station to play their demo tape and wind up holding everyone hostage with plastic guns when the head D.J. refuses to play them.

name: The Runaways
summary_text: A coming-of-age biographical film about the 1970s teenage all-girl rock band The Runaways. The relationship between band members Cherie Currie and Joan Jett is also explored.

name: Can't Hardly Wait
summary_text: A complete graduating class, consisting of beautiful girls, geeks and promising footballers, assemble at a rich classmate's residence for a party. Interesting developments follow at the get-together.

name: London Boulevard
summary_text: An ex-con with a reputation tries to go straight by working as a handy man for a reclusive actress but this is unfortunately not the wish of London's underground crime lord.

name: Mimic
summary_text: Three years ago, entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler genetically created an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease. Now, the insects are out to destroy their only predator, mankind.

name: The Rebound
summary_text: In New York City, a single mom captivates her new neighbor, a much younger man.

name: Reality Bites
summary_text: A documentary filmmaker and her fellow Generation X graduates face life after college, looking for work and love in Houston.

name: Circle
summary_text: Held captive and faced with their imminent executions, fifty strangers are forced to choose the one person among them who deserves to live.

name: Unhinged
summary_text: After a confrontation with an unstable man at an intersection, a woman becomes the target of his rage.

name: Tin Cup
summary_text: A washed up golf pro working at a driving range tries to qualify for the US Open in order to win the heart of his successful rival's girlfriend.

name: Life
summary_text: In 1932, two strangers are wrongfully convicted and develop a strong friendship in prison that lasts them through the 20th century.

name: Adam's Apples
summary_text: A neo-nazi sentenced to community service at a church clashes with the blindly devotional priest.

name: Kon-Tiki
summary_text: Legendary explorer Thor Heyerdahl's epic 4,300-mile crossing of the Pacific on a balsawood raft in 1947, in an effort to prove that it was possible for South Americans to settle in Polynesia in pre-Columbian times.

name: The Fan
summary_text: An all star baseball player becomes the unhealthy focus of a down on his luck salesman.

name: W.
summary_text: A chronicle of the life and Presidency of George W. Bush.

name: Freddy Got Fingered
summary_text: An unemployed cartoonist moves back in with his parents and younger brother Freddy. When his parents demand he leave, he begins to spread rumors that his father is sexually abusing Freddy.

name: The Guilty
summary_text: A police officer assigned alarm dispatch duty enters a race against time when he answers an emergency call from a kidnapped woman.

name: Shaft
summary_text: JJ Shaft, a cyber security expert with a degree from MIT, enlists his family's help to uncover the truth behind his best friend's untimely death.

name: Sydney White
summary_text: A modern retelling of Snow White set against students in their freshman year of college in the greek system.

name: Le Samouraï
summary_text: After professional hitman Jef Costello is seen by witnesses his efforts to provide himself an alibi drive him further into a corner.

name: RoboCop 3
summary_text: Robocop saves the day once more. This time the half man/half robot takes on ruthless developers who want to evict some people on "their" land.

name: Motherless Brooklyn
summary_text: In 1950s New York, a lonely private detective afflicted with Tourette's Syndrome ventures to solve the murder of his mentor and only friend.

name: Black Dynamite
summary_text: Black Dynamite is the greatest African-American action star of the 1970s. When his only brother is killed by The Man, it's up to him to find justice.

name: Soul Surfer
summary_text: Teenage surfer Bethany Hamilton overcomes the odds and her own fears of returning to the water after losing her left arm in a shark attack.

name: Kill the Irishman
summary_text: The true story of Danny Greene, a tough Irish thug working for mobsters in Cleveland during the 1970's.

name: The White Tiger
summary_text: An ambitious Indian driver uses his wit and cunning to escape from poverty and rise to the top. An epic journey based on the New York Times bestseller.

name: History of the World: Part I
summary_text: Mel Brooks brings his one-of-a-kind comic touch to the history of mankind covering events from the Old Testament to the French Revolution in a series of episodic comedy vignettes.

name: Texas Chainsaw
summary_text: A young woman travels to Texas to collect an inheritance; little does she know that an encounter with a chainsaw-wielding killer is part of the reward.

name: Wyatt Earp
summary_text: From Wichita to Dodge City to the O.K. Corral in Tombstone, a man becomes a myth in this thrilling journey of romance, adventure and desperate, heroic action.

name: Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse
summary_text: Three scouts, on the eve of their last camp-out, discover the true meaning of friendship when they attempt to save their town from a zombie outbreak.

name: The Collection
summary_text: A man who escapes from the vicious grips of the serial killer known as "The Collector" is then forced to help rescue an innocent girl from the killer's booby-trapped lair.

name: Gigli
summary_text: Larry Gigli is assigned by a crime boss to kidnap the brother of a prominent district attorney. A beautiful woman known only as Ricki is sent to stay with him to make sure he doesn't mess up the job.

name: Far from the Madding Crowd
summary_text: In Victorian England, the independent and headstrong Bathsheba Everdene attracts three very different suitors: Gabriel Oak, a sheep farmer; Frank Troy, a reckless Sergeant; and William Boldwood, a prosperous and mature bachelor.

name: Psycho
summary_text: A young female embezzler arrives at the Bates Motel, which has terrible secrets of its own.

name: Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter
summary_text: After being mortally wounded and taken to the morgue, murderer Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives and embarks on a killing spree as he makes his way back to his home at Camp Crystal Lake.

name: The Guns of Navarone
summary_text: A team of allied saboteurs are assigned an impossible mission: infiltrate an impregnable Nazi-held island and destroy the two enormous long-range field guns that prevent the rescue of 2,000 trapped British soldiers.

name: Joe
summary_text: An ex-con, who is the unlikeliest of role models, meets a 15-year-old boy and is faced with the choice of redemption or ruin.

name: Bubba Ho-Tep
summary_text: Elvis Presley and a black "JFK" stay in a nursing home where nothing happens - until a wayward Egyptian mummy comes and sucks out the old people's souls thru their a-holes. The two decide to fight back.

name: Child's Play 2
summary_text: While Andy's mother is admitted to a psychiatric hospital, the young boy is placed in foster care, and Chucky, determined to claim Andy's soul, is not far behind.

name: Diary of the Dead
summary_text: A group of young film students run into real-life zombies while filming a horror movie of their own.

name: Keanu
summary_text: When the adorable kitten of an L.A. crime kingpin unexpectedly enters the life of two cousins, they will have to go through tough gangs, pitiless hit-men, and ruthless drug dealers who all claim him, to get him back. How hard can it be?

name: Smokey and the Bandit
summary_text: The Bandit is hired on to run a tractor-trailer full of beer over state lines, in hot pursuit by a pesky sheriff.

name: The Killer
summary_text: A disillusioned assassin accepts one last hit in hopes of using his earnings to restore vision to a singer he accidentally blinded.

name: Hector and the Search for Happiness
summary_text: A psychiatrist searches the globe to find the secret of happiness.

name: Marnie
summary_text: Mark marries Marnie although she is a habitual thief and has serious psychological problems, and tries to help her confront and resolve them.

name: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
summary_text: Brick is an alcoholic ex-football player who drinks his days away and resists the affections of his wife. A reunion with his terminal father jogs a host of memories and revelations for both father and son.

name: 28 Days
summary_text: A big-city newspaper columnist is forced to enter a drug and alcohol rehab center after ruining her sister's wedding and crashing a stolen limousine.

name: Parenthood
summary_text: The Buckmans are a midwestern family all dealing with their lives: estranged relatives, raising children, pressures of the job, and learning to be a good parent and spouse.

name: Inspector Gadget
summary_text: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer.

name: The Great Mouse Detective
summary_text: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.

name: Kelly's Heroes
summary_text: A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.

name: Son of Saul
summary_text: A Jewish-Hungarian concentration camp prisoner sets out to give a child he mistook for his son a proper burial.

name: A Bad Moms Christmas
summary_text: As their own mothers drop in unexpectedly, our three under-appreciated and over-burdened moms rebel against the challenges and expectations of the Super Bowl for mothers: Christmas.

name: Forbidden Planet
summary_text: A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.

name: My Sassy Girl
summary_text: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

name: The Zero Theorem
summary_text: A hugely talented but socially isolated computer operator is tasked by Management to prove the Zero Theorem: that the universe ends as nothing, rendering life meaningless. But meaning is what he already craves.

name: Blow Out
summary_text: A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

name: Two Days, One Night
summary_text: Liège, Belgium. Sandra is a factory worker who discovers that her workmates have opted for a EUR1,000 bonus in exchange for her dismissal. She has only a weekend to convince her colleagues to give up their bonuses in order to keep her job.

name: How the Grinch Stole Christmas!
summary_text: A grumpy hermit hatches a plan to steal Christmas from the Whos of Whoville.

name: Extract
summary_text: Joel, the owner of an extract plant, tries to contend with myriad personal and professional problems, such as his potentially unfaithful wife and employees who want to take advantage of him.

name: Goodnight Mommy
summary_text: Twin boys move to a new house with their mother after she has face-changing cosmetic surgery, but under the bandages is someone the boys don't recognize.

name: The Man Who Would Be King
summary_text: Two British former soldiers decide to set themselves up as Kings in Kafiristan, a land where no white man has set foot since Alexander the Great.

name: How It Ends
summary_text: In the midst of an apocalypse, a man struggles to reach his pregnant wife, who is thousands of miles away.

name: Much Ado About Nothing
summary_text: Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.

name: Hard Target
summary_text: A woman hires a drifter as her guide through New Orleans in search of her missing father. In the process, they discover a deadly game of cat and mouse behind his disappearance.

name: Passenger 57
summary_text: An airline security expert must take action when he finds himself trapped on a passenger jet when terrorists seize control of it.

name: Bachelorette
summary_text: Three friends are asked to be bridesmaids at a wedding of a woman they used to ridicule back in high school.

name: Child's Play
summary_text: A mother gives her 13-year-old son a toy doll for his birthday, unaware of its more sinister nature.

name: Vegas Vacation
summary_text: In the fourth outing for the vacation franchise, the Griswolds have to survive Vegas fever when they go to Las Vegas for a fun family vacation.

name: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham...
summary_text: After marrying a poor woman, rich Rahul is disowned by his father and moves to London to build a new life. Years later, his now grown up little brother Rohan embarks on a mission to bring Rahul back home and reunite the family again.

name: Herbie Fully Loaded
summary_text: Maggie Peyton, the new owner of Herbie, Number 53, the free-wheelin' Volkswagen bug with a mind of its own, puts the car through its paces on the road to becoming a NASCAR competitor.

name: Employee of the Month
summary_text: A slacker competes with a repeat winner for the "Employee of the Month" title at work, in order to gain the affections of a new female employee.

name: The Pirates! Band of Misfits
summary_text: Pirate Captain sets out on a mission to defeat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz for the Pirate of the year Award. The quest takes Captain and his crew from the shores of Blood Island to the foggy streets of Victorian London.

name: The Past
summary_text: An Iranian man deserts his French wife and her two children to return to his homeland. Meanwhile, his wife starts up a new relationship, a reality her husband confronts upon his wife's request for a divorce.

name: The Laundromat
summary_text: A widow investigates an insurance fraud, chasing leads to a pair of Panama City law partners exploiting the world's financial system.

name: A Man Apart
summary_text: A man known as Diablo emerges to head a drug cartel after the previous leader is imprisoned.

name: Perfect Stranger
summary_text: A journalist goes undercover to ferret out businessman Harrison Hill as her childhood friend's killer. Posing as one of his temps, she enters into a game of online cat-and-mouse.

name: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
summary_text: A small-town doctor learns that the population of his community is being replaced by emotionless alien duplicates.

name: The Rover
summary_text: 10 years after a global economic collapse, a hardened loner pursues the men who stole his only possession, his car. Along the way, he captures one of the thieves' brother, and the duo form an uneasy bond during the dangerous journey.
The events leading up to an 11:14 p.m. car crash, from five very different perspectives.

name: The Odd Life of Timothy Green
summary_text: A childless couple bury a box in their backyard, containing all of their wishes for an infant. Soon, a child is born, though Timothy Green is not all that he appears.

name: Very Bad Things
summary_text: A prostitute is killed during a bachelor party and the attendees turn on each other as the wedding approaches.

name: The Belko Experiment
summary_text: In a twisted social experiment, eighty Americans are locked in their high-rise corporate office in Bogotá, Colombia, and ordered by an unknown voice coming from the company's intercom system to participate in a deadly game of kill or be killed.

name: The Ridiculous 6
summary_text: An outlaw who was raised by Native Americans discovers that he has five half-brothers. Together the men go on a mission to find their wayward, deadbeat dad.

name: The King of Staten Island
summary_text: Scott has been a case of arrested development since his firefighter dad died. He spends his days smoking weed and dreaming of being a tattoo artist until events force him to grapple with his grief and take his first steps forward in life.

name: Apostle
summary_text: In 1905, a drifter on a dangerous mission to rescue his kidnapped sister tangles with a sinister religious cult on an isolated island.

name: Sleuth
summary_text: A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to meet him, setting up a battle of wits with potentially deadly results.

name: Bad Company
summary_text: When an Ivy League-educated C.I.A. Agent is killed during an operation, the secret agency recruits his twin brother (Chris Rock).

name: No Man's Land
summary_text: Bosnia and Herzegovina during 1993 at the time of the heaviest fighting between the two warring sides. Two soldiers from opposing sides in the conflict, Nino and Ciki, become trapped in no man's land, whilst a third soldier becomes a living booby trap.

name: Toni Erdmann
summary_text: A practical joking father tries to reconnect with his hard working daughter by creating an outrageous alter ego and posing as her CEO's life coach.

name: Cosmopolis
summary_text: Riding across Manhattan in a stretch limo in order to get a haircut, a 28-year-old billionaire asset manager's day devolves into an odyssey with a cast of characters that start to tear his world apart.

name: Arctic
summary_text: A man stranded in the Arctic after a plane crash must decide whether to remain in the relative safety of his makeshift camp or to embark on a deadly trek through the unknown.

name: After the Sunset
summary_text: The story of what happens after a master thief achieves his last big score, when the F.B.I. Agent who promised he'd capture him, is about to do just that.

name: Black Death
summary_text: Set during the time of the first outbreak of bubonic plague in England, a young monk is given the task of learning the truth about reports of people being brought back to life in a small village.

name: New York, I Love You
summary_text: Eleven love stories set in one of the most loved and hated cities of the world, New York City.

name: He Got Game
summary_text: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

name: Mongol: The Rise of Genghis Khan
summary_text: The story recounts the early life of Genghis Khan who was a slave before going on to conquer half the world in 1206.

name: Forever Young
summary_text: During a cryogenics test, a pilot frozen in 1939 awakes in 1992 but time is running out, as his body starts to age rapidly.

name: The Witches
summary_text: A young boy stumbles onto a witch convention and must stop them, even after he has been turned into a mouse.

name: Kill the Messenger
summary_text: Journalist Gary Webb, California 1996, started investigating CIA's role in the 1980s in getting crack cocaine to the black part of LA to get money and weapons to the Contras/freedom fighters in Nicaragua.

name: Loaded Weapon 1
summary_text: A spoof on Lethal Weapon (1987), other movies, TV commercials etc. 2 unlike LA cops investigate a cocaine in girl scout cookies case.

name: A Royal Affair
summary_text: A young queen, who is married to an insane king, falls secretly in love with her physician - and together they start a revolution that changes a nation forever.

name: Flight of the Navigator
summary_text: In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.

name: Without a Paddle
summary_text: After their friend dies, three men decide to fulfill their childhood dream by going on a camping expedition for the lost D. B. Cooper bounty, with calamitous results.

name: Run
summary_text: A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret from her.

name: Look Who's Talking Too
summary_text: This time, a new baby is on the way, and it's a girl. Wrapped together with the standard conflict between mother and father, Mikey engages in a bit of sibling rivalry with his new sister.

name: Mirage
summary_text: Two storms separated by 25 years. A woman murdered. A daughter missed. Only 72 hours to discover the truth.

name: Spies Like Us
summary_text: Two bumbling government employees think they are U.S. spies, only to discover that they are actually decoys for Nuclear War.

name: Assault on Precinct 13
summary_text: An unlikely partnership between a Highway Patrol Officer, two criminals and a station secretary is formed to defend a defunct Los Angeles precinct office against a siege by a bloodthirsty street gang.

name: Seeking Justice
summary_text: After his wife is assaulted, a husband enlists the services of a vigilante group to help him settle the score. Then he discovers they want a 'favor' from him in return.

name: The Natural
summary_text: A middle-aged unknown comes seemingly out of nowhere to become a legendary baseball player with almost supernatural talent.

name: Christmas with the Kranks
summary_text: With their daughter, Blair, away, Luther and Nora Krank decide to skip Christmas all together until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate it at the last minute.

name: Rules of Engagement
summary_text: An attorney defends an officer on trial for ordering his troops to fire on civilians after they stormed a U.S. embassy in a Middle Eastern country.

name: Secret in Their Eyes
summary_text: A tight-knit team of rising investigators, along with their supervisor, is suddenly torn apart when they discover that one of their own teenage daughters has been brutally murdered.

name: Da 5 Bloods
summary_text: Four African-American vets battle the forces of man and nature when they return to Vietnam seeking the remains of their fallen squad leader and the gold fortune he helped them hide.

name: Anthropoid
summary_text: Based on the extraordinary true story of Operation Anthropoid, the WWII mission to assassinate SS General Reinhard Heydrich, the main architect behind the Final Solution and the Reich's third in command after Hitler and Himmler.

name: Saved!
summary_text: When a girl attending a Christian high school becomes pregnant, all of her former friends turn on her and she is ostracized and demonized.

name: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
summary_text: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

name: Oliver & Company
summary_text: A lost and alone kitten joins a gang of dogs engaged in petty larceny in New York City.

name: In the Name of the King: A Dungeon Siege Tale
summary_text: A man named Farmer sets out to rescue his kidnapped wife and avenge the death of his son, two acts committed by the Krugs, a race of animal-warriors who are controlled by the evil Gallian.

name: Hara-Kiri
summary_text: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

name: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers
summary_text: Ten years after his original massacre, the invalid Michael Myers awakens on Halloween Eve and returns to Haddonfield to kill his seven-year-old niece. Can Dr. Loomis stop him?

name: Che: Part One
summary_text: In 1956, Ernesto 'Che' Guevara and a band of Castro-led Cuban exiles mobilize an army to topple the regime of dictator Fulgencio Batista.

name: Think Like a Man
summary_text: Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.

name: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
summary_text: Kids all over America want Silver Shamrock masks for Halloween. Doctor Daniel Challis seeks to uncover a plot by Silver Shamrock owner Conal Cochran.

name: Stagecoach
summary_text: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
summary_text: The world-famous singing preteen chipmunk trio return to contend with the pressures of school, celebrity, and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.

name: The Descent: Part 2
summary_text: Refusing to believe her story about cave-dwelling monsters, the sole survivor of a spelunking exploration gone horribly wrong is forced to follow the authorities back into the caves where something awaits.

name: The Message
summary_text: This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Prophet Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.

name: Get Rich or Die Tryin'
summary_text: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from crime to pursue his passion, rap music.

name: Uri: The Surgical Strike
summary_text: Indian army special forces execute a covert operation, avenging the killing of fellow army men at their base by a terrorist group.

name: Creep
summary_text: A young videographer answers an online ad for a one-day job in a remote town to record the last messages of a dying man. When he notices the man's odd behavior, he starts to question his intentions.

name: The Hunted
summary_text: An FBI deep-woods tracker attempts to capture a trained assassin who has made a sport of hunting humans.

name: Bad Taste
summary_text: The population of a small town disappears and is replaced by aliens that chase human flesh for their intergalactic fast-food chain.

name: The First Wives Club
summary_text: Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.

name: The Hole
summary_text: Four teenagers at a British private school secretly uncover and explore the depths of a sealed underground hole created decades ago as a possible bomb shelter.

name: Set It Up
summary_text: Two corporate executive assistants hatch a plan to match-make their two bosses.

name: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
summary_text: A breathtaking, goose flesh igniting, awe inspiring love journey of an ordinary man Suri and his 'total opposite' love Taani.

name: A Haunted House
summary_text: Malcolm and Kisha move into their dream home, but soon learn a demon also resides there. When Kisha becomes possessed, Malcolm - determined to keep his sex life on track - turns to a priest, a psychic, and a team of ghost-busters for help.

name: Under Siege 2: Dark Territory
summary_text: Casey Ryback hops on a Colorado to LA train to start a vacation with his niece. Early into the trip, terrorists board the train and use it as a mobile HQ to hijack a top secret destructive US satellite.

name: To Die For
summary_text: A beautiful but naïve aspiring television personality films a documentary on teenagers with a darker ulterior motive.

name: Nothing to Lose
summary_text: Nick's wife's in bed with his boss. He later gets a gun to his head by a carjacker but steps on the gas pedal. They end up friends after adventures together - holdups, burglary, reckless driving, revenge etc. Twists follow.

name: Far from Heaven
summary_text: In 1950s Connecticut, a housewife faces a marital crisis and mounting racial tensions in the outside world.

name: Hobo with a Shotgun
summary_text: A homeless vigilante blows away crooked cops, pedophile Santas, and other scumbags with his trusty pump-action shotgun.

name: 3000 Miles to Graceland
summary_text: A gang of ex-cons rob a casino during Elvis convention week.

name: Shall We Dance
summary_text: A romantic comedy where a bored, overworked Estate Lawyer, upon first sight of a beautiful instructor, signs up for ballroom dancing lessons.

name: You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger
summary_text: Sally's parents' marriage breaks up when her father undergoes a mid-life crisis and impulsively weds a prostitute. Meanwhile, Sally's own marriage also begins to disintegrate.

name: The Hitcher
summary_text: A young man who escapes the clutches of a murderous hitchhiker is subsequently stalked by the hitcher and framed for his crimes.

name: The Little Rascals
summary_text: Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.

name: Carriers
summary_text: As a lethal virus spreads globally, four friends seek a reputed plague-free haven. But while avoiding the infected, the travelers turn on one another.

name: Mary Queen of Scots
summary_text: Mary Stuart's (Saoirse Ronan's) attempt to overthrow her cousin Elizabeth I (Margot Robbie), Queen of England, finds her condemned to years of imprisonment before facing execution.

name: Red Cliff
summary_text: The first chapter of a two-part story centered on a battle fought in China's Three Kingdoms period (220-280 A.D.).

name: Spellbound
summary_text: A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to recover his memory.

name: Enemy Mine
summary_text: During a long space war, the lives of two wounded enemies become dependent on their ability to forgive and to trust.

name: Waitress
summary_text: Jenna is a pregnant, unhappily married waitress in the deep south. She meets a newcomer to her town and falls into an unlikely relationship as a last attempt at happiness.

name: The Bride of Frankenstein
summary_text: Mary Shelley reveals the main characters of her novel survived: Dr. Frankenstein, goaded by an even madder scientist, builds his monster a mate.

name: Mudbound
summary_text: Two men return home from World War II to work on a farm in rural Mississippi, where they struggle to deal with racism and adjusting to life after war.
